attributes.action: Investigate the code of conduct of parliament with ref to Brexit if no agreement
attributes.additional_details: The decision to leave the EU was made by a majority 1008 days ago, yet no viable plan has been agreed. Our politicians should show the world we are unified & stop in-fighting for individual/party political gain alone, OR we must have an investigation into each politician in  Parliament with ref to their code of conduct, Re:Brexit, with a view to suspend everyone (under the "Recall of MPs Act 2015, condition 4") not carrying out their duties per the "parliamentary code of conduct, III item 6."
attributes.background: With the Brexit fiasco continuing and politicians in the House of Commons destroying any remaining faith in our government, no matter what party they belong to, it's time to remind them that the will and best interests of the people are the fundamental reason they were elected, we CAN replace you!
